title: Checkout error 500 on mobile Safari
recommended_action: Escalate to payments team immediately; known Safari cookie issue. Reference: INC-2024-09-10

title: Login timeout after password reset
recommended_action: Ask user to clear browser cookies and cache. If persistent, check auth service logs. Attach KB article: AUTH-005

title: Slow dashboard loading on initial visit
recommended_action: Check browser version. Known issue with Chrome 120+ on Windows. Workaround: disable hardware acceleration. Fix in v2.4.0

title: Invoice PDF not generating
recommended_action: Regenerate invoice via admin panel. Check if invoice has special characters in customer name. Attach: KB-BILL-12

title: Two-factor authentication SMS not arriving
recommended_action: Verify phone number format (+1 prefix required). Check SMS provider status page. If urgent, offer email backup codes.

title: API rate limit exceeded error
recommended_action: Explain current rate limits (100 req/min). Suggest implementing exponential backoff. For higher limits, escalate to sales.

title: CSV export returns empty file
recommended_action: Check if date range filter exceeds 1 year. Known timeout issue. Ask user to narrow date range or contact support for bulk export.

title: How to integrate with Zapier
recommended_action: Attach integration guide: DOC-ZAPIER-101. Offer to schedule onboarding call if enterprise customer.

title: Subscription cancellation not processing
recommended_action: Escalate to billing team immediately. Issue manual cancellation and pro-rated refund. Check for pending invoices.

title: Dark mode images not visible
recommended_action: Known CSS issue affecting logo and profile pictures. Fix scheduled for v2.3.1 (next week). Workaround: use light mode temporarily.

title: Password reset email not received
recommended_action: Check spam/junk folder. Verify email address spelling. Manually resend via admin panel if needed. Check email service logs.

title: Webhook delivery failures
recommended_action: Verify customer endpoint is publicly accessible and returns 200 OK within 5s. Check webhook logs for retry attempts. Increase timeout if needed.

title: How to upgrade from Free to Pro plan
recommended_action: Send pricing page link and feature comparison. If annual billing, offer 20% discount. Schedule demo for teams > 10 users.

title: Search results showing deleted items
recommended_action: Clear Elasticsearch index cache. Known indexing lag (~15 min). If persists >24h, escalate to search team with customer ID.

title: Mobile app crashes on startup (iOS 18)
recommended_action: Known compatibility issue with iOS 18.0. Fixed in app version 3.2.1. Ask user to update app from App Store immediately.
